snippet.title: STALCRAFT: X (2024) - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
It might come as a surprise to our English-speaking audience, but soon it will be 10 years since our Chernobyl Zone first welcomed its initial stalkers. To avoid a midlife anniversary crisis, we decided to buckle down and completely overhaul everything, in the best traditions of EXBO!

Even the game's name hasn't escaped this fate, so from now on you will be playing STALCRAFT: X. We will reveal the significance of this change with a full trailer, which will be released on July 10 alongside the global update.

This teaser was entirely shot using the game's engine. Please, don't hesitate to leave a comment - your emotions are very important to us, we feed on them!

🖥 To address the most popular question in the comments in advance, here are the planned updated system requirements:

Minimum:
i5 3470 - 750ti
r3 1200 - rx560

Recommended:
i5 6400 - 1050ti
r3 1200 - rx570

🔎 Follow us on:

Facebook – https://bit.ly/3tTi3fH
Discord (Eu) – https://bit.ly/3tUx15a
Discord (NA) – https://bit.ly/3gvdGV8
Discord (SEA) – https://bit.ly/3gvdGV8
Reddit – https://bit.ly/3XoCxKN
Instagram – https://bit.ly/3Xsch1Z
Twitter – https://bit.ly/3Xtr4cK

#stalcraft
